name: Dream Invader Tim: Dream of Nightmare
name_original: Dream Invader Tim: Dream of Nightmare
description:
YOUR DREAMS ARE BEING INVADED!

Dream Invader Tim is here to consume all of your Dream Energy. You must guide your Counting Sheep to use Fantastical Items from your dreams to thwart the parasite. Time is of the essence! If you do not stop them in time, all your dreams will become nightmares and you will awake to have a bad day.

This is an entry for the PIGSquad summerslowjams:Bossfight game jam

*NOW PLAYABLE* 

(keyboard)

for a behind the scenes look here is a link to the Game Development Document for the game.
